title: Wanpaku Ouji no Orochi Taiji
synopsis: Susanoo, the youngest child of the creation gods Izanagi and Izanami, is a mighty warrior, easily able to defeat tigers with his bare hands. After his mother dies, Susanoo is devastated. Determined to travel to Heaven to find her, he carves a boat out of a tree, and along with his rabbit companion, Akahana, he prepares to cross the ocean.
staff: [['Serikawa, Yuugo', ['Director']], ['Takahata, Isao', ['Assistant Director']], ['Hayashi, Seiichi', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Hirata, Toshio', ['In-Between Animation']]]
